tool_description: Calculates the total loyalty points earned for a transaction based on applicable rules and bonuses.
error_messages: Invalid transaction amount: Amount must be a positive number greater than 0.
Invalid base rate: base_points_per_dollar must be a non-negative number.
Invalid multiplier: tier_multiplier must be greater than 0.
Invalid bonus values: category_bonus and promotional_bonus must be non-negative numbers.
Calculation overflow: Resulting points exceed maximum allowed value.
usage: Provide transaction amount and applicable point rates to calculate total earned points. All bonus and multiplier parameters are optional with sensible defaults.

total_points_earned.description: Total points earned (rounded down to nearest integer)
